summary: Our Hungarian company, IdM Solution grew to be a respected supplier of major international brands. In order to extend business possibilities I moved to The Netherlands where I co-founded Narabi Systems. We aim to provide quality enterprise software development services at an affordable price by involving our highly skilled Hungarian experts.

Lister
Vodafone Group Technology Security Vulnerability Management Portal
projects.description:
Vodafone Group Technology Security needed an application that consolidates vulnerability data from scanners of different vendors, supports its engineers around the globe by driving and automating vulnerability management and scan workflows, providing data visualisation and KPIs. Since there was no suitable solution on the market, Vodafone entrusted us with custom software development. The application serves hundreds of users worldwide and constantly processes scan data of hundreds of thousands of servers all across the globe.

My responsibilities as Perl developer & database expert were:
 • Back-end development in Perl (processing scan data and implementing automated actions),
 • Database design,
 • Database optimisation,
 • Data migration and transformation scripts,
 • Tooling to support the development team

projects.title: JiD

• ForgeRock OpenAM configuration and customisation
• Demo site development

projects.description: K&H Bank had no internal Business Analyst to deal with CUA related tasks and projects at that time. K&H externalised this role to our company. I acted as Business Analyst in several pre-studies on behalf of K&H Bank. I was participating in workshops, meetings, doing presentations, writing business requirement specifications and decision support documents.

K&H Security Audit
projects.description: The Central User Administration System had to be upgraded to meet audit demands. I was responsible for planning and supervising the upgrade. I involved two additional subcontractors to cover the required technical expertise.

System management - MKB Bank
projects.description: Design and implement BMC PATROL system management for MS Windows, HP-UX, IBM AIX, MS-SQL, MS Exchange, IBM Tivoli Storage Management and several key IT & business applications. I developed custom modules. One of my fixes was even incorporated into BMC Software's PATROL product. Due to high 3rd party licence fees I helped the client save costs by reimplementing the key functions of the IBM TSM management module. (BMC PATROL, PATROL PLS, shell scripts)

projects.title: System management - Inter Europa Bank
projects.description: Design and implement BMC PATROL system management for MS Windows OS, MS-SQL, Lotus Notes servers and several key custom IT & business applications. I integrated a 3rd party system management solution. Both the project and the handover was very efficient and professional. I take pride in my contribution to the team accomplishment. Due to my exceptional performance on this project I was awarded "Employee of the year".

I designed and developed a management reporting system (MS-SQL & Oracle back-end, MS Access front-end).

profile_positions.description: We’ve grown a successful software development company in Hungary, which has become a recognized supplier of dominant international brands. To keep the momentum we’ve moved our focus to a more favourable business environment, which we’ve found in the beautiful city of The Hague.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description: I started IdM Solutions to leverage the 10+ years of IT expertise gained working at large enterprises. Although I acquired an entrepreneur attitude and got experienced in company management, I was a prime time IT professional until 2015 when we started to focus more on company growth.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description: My responsibility was to finish the identity management project at K&H Bank. I had to liaise between the subcontractor and the client under very turbulent conditions. I take pride in being able to bridge the gap between the software development constraints and the business requirements of the client.
profile_positions.title: Identity Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Introduce an identity management solution based on BMC Identity Management Suite integrated with a custom Java web application at K&H Bank (2nd largest bank in Hungary). The identity management system manages access management for 300+ business applications, implements application specific access management processes and handles a total of ~300.000 accounts. The system was to be integrated with SAP HR database and manage ~10.000 employees and externals. The workflow engine had to support highly customizable business logic.

My duties and responsibilities were:
• Business process analysis
• Writing Business Requirement Specification for the subcontractor
• Involved in designing the new identity management solution
• Involved in project management
• Negotiating and designing workarounds
• Involved in business logic specific Java development as well
• Coordinate user acceptance testing
• Documentation

Key technologies: BMC Identity Management Suite, Oracle Database, Sun Solaris, PL/SQL, Java, BeanShell, Perl, Subversion, TRAC, Microsoft Visio, Microsoft Office
profile_positions.title: Identity Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
My duties included:
• Designing and implementing BMC Patrol based IT system management solutions
• Providing consultancy
• Giving trainings
• Supporting sales activities

The scope of these system management projects included but not limited to:
• Server management of MS Windows and various commercial Unix OSes
• MS-SQL and Oracle Database Server management
• MS Exchange, Lotus Notes management
• Management of several custom-built applications
• Integration with 3rd party system management products

Key clients: MKB Bank, Inter-Europa Bank, Hungarian Ministry of Defence, Hungarian Central Statistical Office

Due to my excellent performance I was awarded “The Employee of the Year” in 2005.
